newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Pure Foods to close down ice cream unit.
newsitem.headline: Pure Foods to close down ice cream unit.

text.p: Pure Foods Corp said on Friday it would close down its ice cream operations on or before June 2 this year.
Pure Foods said in a statement the closure was needed for the company to concentrate on its core businesses such as processed meats, flour, poultry, livestock and feeds.

Pure Foods, a subsidiary of Ayala Corp conglomerate, entered the ice cream business in 1992 after it acquired two brands from local businessmen. It gained market share initially, but competition from San Miguel Corp and Selecta Dairy Products Inc proved too daunting.
The company scaled down its manpower and advertising and promotional costs last year to improve its financial condition.
"In the final analysis, however, the basic problem the division faced was still the lack of that critical mass of consumption to make the business profitable," the company said.
"Management thought it best to close down this operating division and to invest instead in the more profitable segments of the food industry," it added.
The company is venturing into the fast food business.
